content.raw: I agree that Gazebo doesn't need to be catkinized, but this is just a minimally-intrusive way to allow it to be built in a catkin workspace. It's really just for convenience for source-builds, since this doesn't affect debian package generation at all.
content.html: I agree that Gazebo doesn't need to be catkinized, but this is just a minimally-intrusive way to allow it to be built in a catkin workspace. It's really just for convenience for source-builds, since this doesn't affect debian package generation at all.
